learningObjective: On line 10 enter an expression for /* expression */ so that the Confirm statement evaluates to true
referenceMaterial:
• On Line 6:   Remember;
    At the point of the Remember statement in the code, the value of a variable 'x' is assumed to be #x and #x can be used in Confirm statements

  • On Line 10:
       =    <    <=    >    >=
    are the relational operators from which to choose
